name: Friving Car Flying Game 2017
description:
Friving Car Flying Game 2017!! You will test your flying and driving skills at the same time with this car flying simulator game. Transform your asphalt car in aero plane and fly your massive highly detailed car around the world and get a preview in this car flying adventure.
FEATURES:
-Put your driving and flight controls to the test
-Incredible HD Graphics
-Real life sports car modified for flight capability
-Detailed and immersive city world environment
-Fun, realistic driving controls
